FuncDef: This command specifies the import route policy to be used for determining which membership reports are accepted by the router. Route policies are configured in theconfig>router>policy-optionscontext.

ParaDef.Info: The route policy name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed between double quotes. Route policies are configured in the config>router>policy-options context.
